author: pamarcelot
msg: Updating the LDAP Studio RCP Application to display a Welcome Perspective.
This perspective offers the choice to launch the LDAP Browser Perspective or the Schemas Editor Perspective.
A link has also been added to the ASF logo at the bottom of the view.

author: fhanik
msg: TCK correction, depending on the sequence of the tests, the converter turns out to be null at certain times.
Added in a check to create the converter even when getting the output stream.
